title: Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee Website

requirements.text: Create a visually cohesive and elegant website theme inspired by Islamic geometric patterns and traditional motifs. Use a color palette of deep green, gold, and cream/off-white. Apply consistent Arabic-influenced decorative borders, geometric ornaments, and serif/elegant typography throughout the site for a dignified community organization feel.

quotes: मस्जिद ए गौसिया वेलफेयर कमेटी का वेबसाइट बनाये

acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a deep green, gold, and cream color palette consistently
Islamic geometric decorative elements are present in headers, dividers, or borders
Typography is elegant and readable throughout all sections

requirements.text: Build a Hero/Header section with the organization name 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee', a tagline such as 'Serving the Community with Faith and Compassion', and a prominent navigation bar with links to all main sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Organization name is prominently displayed in the hero section
A tagline is shown beneath the organization name
Navigation bar links scroll to all main page sections

requirements.text: Build an 'About Us' section describing the Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee, its mission, values, and community purpose. Include placeholder text that can be edited later.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us section is visible on the page
Contains mission and values text
Section is clearly titled and styled consistently with the theme

requirements.text: Build a 'Services & Programs' section listing welfare activities such as Education Support, Food & Ration Distribution, Medical Assistance, and Community Events. Each service should have an icon, title, and brief description.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 welfare services/programs are displayed as cards
Each card has an icon or visual element, a title, and a short description
Cards are laid out in a responsive grid

requirements.text: Build an 'Announcements / News' section that displays community announcements. On the backend, implement a Motoko actor with stable storage for announcements (title, body, date). Provide a public query to retrieve all announcements and an admin update function to add new ones. Display the announcements fetched from the backend on the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores announcements with title, body, and date fields
Frontend fetches and displays announcements from the backend canister
Announcements section shows the most recent items first
Empty state is handled gracefully with a placeholder message

requirements.text: Build a 'Donate / Support Us' section with a compelling call-to-action encouraging community members to support the welfare committee. Include a visible donation appeal message and a placeholder for donation/contact details.
acceptanceCriteria: Donation/support section is present on the page
Contains a clear call-to-action message
Styled prominently to draw attention

requirements.text: Build a 'Contact Us' footer section with placeholder fields for address, phone number, email, and a simple contact inquiry form (name, email, message, submit button). Store submitted contact inquiries in the backend using Motoko stable storage.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays address, phone, and email placeholders
A contact form is present with name, email, and message fields
Form submission stores the inquiry in the backend canister
User sees a success confirmation after submitting

requirements.text: Render the generated static images (mosque-hero-banner, logo, and geometric divider) from frontend/public/assets/generated as visual assets in the hero section, header/logo area, and as decorative section dividers respectively.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the mosque banner image as background or featured image
Logo image is displayed in the navigation/header area
Geometric divider image is used between major sections

constraints: All text on the website must be in English
Do not use blue or purple as primary colors
All backend logic must remain in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Online payment processing or real donation gateway integration
User authentication or admin login panel

required: Grand mosque exterior at dusk with warm golden lighting and minaret silhouettes against a deep teal-green sky, wide landscape banner (mosque-hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png)
Circular emblem with Islamic geometric star pattern in gold and deep green on a cream background, suitable as an organization logo (committee-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Horizontal decorative divider with repeating Islamic arabesque and geometric floral pattern in gold on transparent background (geometric-divider.dim_1200x80.png)
